paper.title: A Verification Strategy for Timing-Constrained Systems
paper.abstract: Verification of many properties can be done without regard to the speed of the components of a finite-state system. However, some of the properties can be verified only under certain timing constraints. We propose a new verification strategy for timing constrained finite-state systems. The strategy can avoid the state space explosion problem for a class of systems. A model of such systems, called timed L-process, compatible with the strategy, is also developed.
